org.jerkar.api.java.junit

Class JkUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.java.junit.JkUnit

  • public final class JkUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenient class to launch Junit tests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  JkUnit.Enhancer
      A interface to implement to enhance test execution.
      static class  JkUnit.JunitReportDetail
      Detail level for the junit report.

      • forked

        public JkUnit forked(JkJavaProcess process,
                     boolean appendClasspath)
        Creates a forked JkUnit from this one but using the specified process. If appendClasspath is true then the classpath already defined in this object is appended to the specified process classpath.

      • forked

        public JkUnit forked(boolean fork,
                     JkJavaProcess process,
                     boolean appendClasspath)
        Creates an identical JkUnit to this one but specifying the forked mode. If the forked mode is true then the specified JkJavaProcess is used to run the tests..

      • forked

        public JkUnit forked(boolean fork)
        Creates an identical JkUnit to this one but specifying the forked mode. If the forked mode is true then default JkJavaProcess is used to run the tests (java process launched without any option).

      • withClassesToTest

        public JkUnit withClassesToTest(JkFileTreeSet classesToTest)
        Returns an enhanced copy of this launcher but specifying location of classes to test.

      • withOutputOnConsole

        public JkUnit withOutputOnConsole(boolean outputOnConsole)
        Returns an enhanced copy of this launcher but specifying if the output should be displayed on console.

        public JkUnit withClassesToTest(JkFileTree classesToTest)
